price: 76.Tokkel Yalli isi muxxok maalu keenih yecee waqdi, woo xagana makeeniih woo maalul gaba yigibdeeniih usun Yallaa kee kay farmoytih amrit derre caben.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦ بَخِلُواْ بِهِۦ وَتَوَلَّواْ وَّهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: falammā ātāhum min faḍlihi bakhilū bihi watawallaw wahum muʿ'riḍūna
